title: Council Regulation (EC) No 1624/98 of 20 July 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 establishing a support system for producers of certain arable crops
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1624/98 of 20 July 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 establishing a support system for producers of certain arable crops
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from the 1998/1999 marketing year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 July 1998.
For the Council
The President
W. MOLTERER
